content.rendered:
WHO WE ARE

Takns International for Petroleum Services (TIFBS), a subsidiary of Takns Holding Group established in 2015. TIFBS is offering an integrated fit-for-purpose, fit-for-use solutions and services for the Libyan national Oil & gas Sector. Focusing on our unique services and partnership spirit, our valued customers from Libyan National Oil Companies are used to receive our innovative and quality solutions. TIFBS is working to satisfy their needs via the best, most advanced and modern EPCC Projects, Solutions and Services in all Oil & Gas related streams.

WHO WE ARE

Takns International for Petroleum Services (TIFBS), a subsidiary of Takns Holding Group established in 2015. TIFBS is offering an integrated fit-for-purpose, fit-for-use solutions and services for the Libyan national Oil & gas Sector. Focusing on our unique services and partnership spirit, our valued customers from Libyan National Oil Companies are used to receive our innovative and quality solutions. TIFBS is working to satisfy their needs via the best, most advanced and modern EPCC Projects, Solutions and Services in all Oil & Gas related streams.

We Deliver Enduring Results

TIFBS Vision

1-Enhancing production capabilities by increasing efficiency and production capacity in oil and gas exploration and production.
2-Sustainability and commitment to sustainable and environmentally responsible operating practices.
3-Technical development and application of the latest technologies and innovative solutions to improve operations.
4-Customer satisfaction by providing distinguished services that meet the needs and expectations of our customers.

TIFBS Goals

Production Enhancement, Sustainability, Technology and Customer Satisfaction

OUR CLIENTS 

OUR PARTNERS
